stories.headline: Newsrooms, start your engines
stories.summary: An exploration of how different newsrooms have implemented Computer-Assisted Reporting (CAR) programs.

stories.headline: Picture this
stories.summary: Discusses challenges broadcast journalists face when starting CAR programs without upper management support.

stories.headline: Wired Setting 'Net policy
stories.summary: Provides guidelines for responsible use of Internet resources by journalism professionals.

stories.headline: Making it work
stories.summary: Outlines the practices essential for successfully implementing CAR in newsrooms, including the importance of a mission statement.
